document.docOrigin: Arthropod fauna of the UAE, Abu Dhabi: Dar Al Ummah

figureCitation.captionText: Figures 57 - 60. 57 - 58: Plexippus minor nov. spec.; 59 - 60: Plexippııs paykulli (Audouin). 57 - 59: Palpal organ in ventral view; 58 - 60: Same in lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Description: See Wesolowska & van Harten ( 1994 ). Palpal structure as shown in
Figures 59 and 60
herein.
Distribution: A common pantropical species. New to the UAE .
